comments.body: Just a comment; IMO it might be better to clean up this test for removing duplicated code between `AnsiTypeCoercionSuite` and `TypeCoercionSuite` in the followup PRs.

My concern is that there are a lot of test cases that have partial differences between the two suites.
Anyway, I have created https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-34413 as followup jira. Remove duplicated code is always good.
Just to check; we cannot implicitly cast foldable `array(string)` to `array(numeric)`?
We can. I have updated the code and test case
